EmailTemplate.name: 17.IPRout.Partner.All.A.G.E.17177.Pricing Updates NAM PRM.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: e-Bulletin: ION / IP Partner Product and Maintenance Services Price Catalogs update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> e-Bulletin: ION / IP Partner Product and Maintenance Services Price Catalogs update Dear Partners,
During the week of September 18, 2017 we have updated and published the ION / IP Routing Partner Product and Maintenance Services Price Catalogs. They are available on the Nokia PRM Partner Portal <[[https://nokia.lightning.force.com/lightning/page/home]]>. Please look inside the pricing groups associated with your accounts on the PRM.
- Key Highlights: Generated with updated IP Routing pricing tool v1.2.8 [PPP v75]. Includes Hardware and Software updates:
- We will organize “How to use the latest ION / IP price catalogs” training sessions in October. Invites will be sent shortly. - Product Notifications: To receive notifications on product updates, manufacture discontinued dates and other product status changes, please subscribe to Notifications in OLCS <[[https://support.alcatel-lucent.com/portal/web/support]]> (Nokia’s on-line customer support website). Go to OLCS>MyAccount>ManageSubscriptions>Alerts. To receive notifications on partner price catalog updates, please subscribe to Notifications from within your partners’ Personal spaces.
For more information: Latest Pricing rules type of information are available, by Route to Market type on the Nokia PRM Partner Portal <[[https://nokia.lightning.force.com/lightning/page/home]]>. Please contact us should you have any questions.
Bogdan Vasilescu Nokia Global Partner Program and Sales Team Connect with us © 2017 Nokia. Contact us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Privacy policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
